timeSeries 4021.105

  • Changelog

    Reversion of a 'timeSeries'

    base-rev.Rd

    Reverses an uni- or multivariate "timeSeries" object by reversing the order of the time stamps.

    Usage

    # S4 method for timeSeries
rev(x)

    Arguments

    x

    an uni- or multivariate "timeSeries" object.

    Value

    a "timeSeries" object

    Examples

    ## Create Dummy timeSeries -    
   tS <- dummySeries()
   
## Reverse Series -
   rev(tS)
#> GMT
#>                 TS.1       TS.2
#> 2022-12-01 0.6729721 0.19406107
#> 2022-11-01 0.4247208 0.79141426
#> 2022-10-01 0.8271528 0.63105261
#> 2022-09-01 0.5613392 0.89735853
#> 2022-08-01 0.5219762 0.33986002
#> 2022-07-01 0.9675356 0.41451818
#> 2022-06-01 0.4138172 0.75224267
#> 2022-05-01 0.1007970 0.53800102
#> 2022-04-01 0.4455616 0.09680616
#> 2022-03-01 0.5493377 0.30257193
#> 2022-02-01 0.1195839 0.27051576
#> 2022-01-01 0.4549714 0.53838569
